sentences.sContent: And from a behaviorist point of view this is because of the associative history of these things.
sentences.sContent_eng: And from a behaviorist point of view this is because of the associative history of these things.
sentences.sCn: 在行为主义者看来,这是在这些事物之间的联结历史造成的。

sentences.sContent: As the behaviorist tells us, man can be thought of as "an assembled organic machine ready to run.
sentences.sContent_eng: As the behaviorist tells us, man can be thought of as "an assembled organic machine ready to run.
sentences.sCn: 正如行为主义者告诉我们的，一个人被看作是“一台组装好的即将发动的机器”。

sentences.sContent: Starting from this manifest falsehood, the behaviorist proposes to operate the "human Ford" the way the operator drives his car.
sentences.sContent_eng: Starting from this manifest falsehood, the behaviorist proposes to operate the "human Ford" the way the operator drives his car.
sentences.sCn: 从这个明显谬论开始，行为主义者设想着用驾驶员开车的方式驾驶我们这辆“人类福特”。

trans.tranCn: 行为主义者, 行为科学家
